title: No impact of steatotic liver disease on clinical outcomes in patients with essential thrombocythemia and polycythemia vera: A pilot study
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Ivan Krečak, Josipa Antonija Bačić, Nevena Šimunić, Vesna Bušac, Ljerka Pivac, Eva Čubrić, Marko Skelin, Marko Lucijanić
